body_html: Hi, can anyone take a look at this PR ? For now the CUDA reference implementation seems to be inefficient when dealing with narrow matrices and before I go ahead and implement some specializations for dealing with narrow matrices in XLA, I'd like to make sure that the CUDA version of my idea looks okay.
body_text: Hi, can anyone take a look at this PR ? For now the CUDA reference implementation seems to be inefficient when dealing with narrow matrices and before I go ahead and implement some specializations for dealing with narrow matrices in XLA, I'd like to make sure that the CUDA version of my idea looks okay.
body: Hi, can anyone take a look at this [PR](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/13049) ? For now the CUDA reference implementation seems to be inefficient when dealing with narrow matrices and before I go ahead and implement some specializations for dealing with narrow matrices in XLA, I'd like to make sure that the CUDA version of my idea looks okay.
